thread.title: Kanye West's Cousin Mourns Death Of Infant Son
thread.title_full: Kanye West's Cousin Mourns Death Of Infant Son

author: Danielle Harling
title: Kanye West's Cousin Mourns Death Of Infant Son
text:
Kanye West's Cousin Mourns Death Of Infant Son March 14, 2017 | 12:22 PM 5 
Ricky Anderson, cousin to rapper Kanye West , endured a heartbreaking loss this week when his son died suddenly. 
TMZ reports that the G.O.O.D. Music A&R’s son Avery died in his sleep, despite there being no previous signs of illness or distress. 
Anderson has since posted several personal videos of his son to Instagram. In a photo of Avery he shared yesterday (March 13), Anderson offered the following caption: 
“Today was the worst day of my life!! I lost my lil man and gained an angel! Rest in Paradise!!!! I love you man” A post shared by Ricky Anderson (@rickygervoussss) on Mar 13, 2017 at 12:56pm PDT A post shared by Ricky Anderson (@rickygervoussss) on Mar 13, 2017 at 3:03pm PDT 
The child’s mother, Erica Paige, also posted a heartbreaking Instagram tribute to her son. A post shared by E (@erica.paige) on Mar 14, 2017 at 8:54am PDT 
HipHopDX sends its condolences to Avery Anderson’s family. Subscribe to DX Newsletter Get The Most Important Stories Of The Day Straight To Your Inbox Thank You! Thank You! Thank You!
